name: Maya Klotski Unblock Big Block Game with Solver
name_original: Maya Klotski Unblock Big Block Game with Solver
description:
This is the most classic puzzles in the world
It is older than two thousands of years....

Is it a blessing or a curse, tell us with your intelligence
Keep touching, keep moving, you can make your own legend...

*Adding new features to help you overcome the difficulties！


***********************************************
The game really is great.That's what I want to play.I finally found it today.The game is much more interesting than other games.I'm going to play!
***********************************************
I thought it is very difficult at first.But I found the fun of it after I discovered the law .
***********************************************
It's a very interesting Mini-Game.I've been playing the game for a long time.It's very difficult to play perfect.But I believe myself.Anyone can challenge me!The operation and design is very good.It's worth playing.
